name: T - Emily
_source: speak;Emma; Emily, you got me good, but not good enough!!
speak;Emily; Nice try, but I can see your fire coming from a mile away!!
speak;Emma; Dodge this little spark then!
speak;Emily; Ahhh!!! Haha!!!{w} I haven't had this much fun since we were kids!{w} We should do a little bit of sparring more often.
speak;Emma; Hehe, I have to admit that was pretty fun.
speak;Emma; Though, I feel like your 'blunt' arrows still hurt a bit too much{tgm}...
speak;Emily; I could say the same thing about your 'weakened' spells.
speak;Emma; Hmph, well, sometimes I don't know my own strength.

speak;Emily; Heh, yeah yeah, Ms. Magic{tgm}...{tgm}{w}{c:expression;Emily;NoSmile} Hey, I think tonight's supposed to be a full moon.{w} Do you wanna watch it?{w} We can look at the stars like we used to when we were little!
speak;Emma; That's a great idea!{w} Maybe we can even find someone else to join us, too.{w} It'd be a shame not to share the view with a friend or two.
speak;Emily; Sounds like a plan!{w} I'll see if I can get anyone on board!
speak;Emma; I bet Mom should be finishing up dinner soon...;;;thought_bubble;no_talk
